name: Run to the Light
description:
Run to the Light is a short game made in one week for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2. The theme was "You are not alone", and I interpreted it as: you are a child named Michael who is scared of the dark and you are trying to turn on light switches, but something is holding you back!

Sorta short because I totally didn't waste 99.9999% of my time playing Fall Guys.
